article_title: Why Starbucks has no business talking about race
article_text:

twitter.description:
Starbucks is getting plenty of criticisms over its new efforts to get people talking about race relations.
The company recently encouraged its baristas to write the words “race together” on cup...
twitter.title: Why Starbucks has no business talking about race
